projects.title: Projects
descriptions: Boardify brings all your daily tasks in an organized and intuitive way. Drag and Drop functionality for easier and faster organization of your tasks and boards. Allows you to create, read, edit and delete tasks and boards (CRUD).

Color Crafter allows the user to choose a color and automatically generates different color palettes so that the user can choose the one that works best for him. Select the color from a generic color palette or with the hexadecimal value of the color. Allow to copy and paste the different colors from the palette or a specific color.

Music weather is an application that combines two APIs (Weather API and Spotify API) to show the user the weather of a city and a song would accompany this search according to the weather at that moment.
